accessPolicy.description: Below are real-time logs for reviewing access policies when performing actions on your account resources.

activity.description: Below are real-time logs for actions related to OVHcloud APIs.

audit.description: Below are real-time logs for security-related actions on your customer account: user login actions, password changes, user and user group creation and modification.

liveTail.noLogs: No logs yet. New logs will appear here.

dataStreams.title: Data Streams
dataStreams.description: By subscribing to your customer account's security logs, they will be transferred to the Logs Data Platform. This platform gives you access to advanced features such as alerting, search execution, and retention management.

empty.title: No subscriptions
empty.description: You don't have any data stream subscriptions yet.

noLogsAvailable.title: Logs unavailable
noLogsAvailable.description: Logs are not available for your account.

errors.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to access logs.
